name: Untitled Goo Game 2: Breakdown Boogaloo
description:
For GGJ 2020; Theme: Repair

Play as a goo traversing their world by constantly breaking and repairing themselves and the environment.

Controls

Keyboard

[Sideways] Movement

AD or Left/Right Arrow Keys

Break/Repair Player

Space

Break [Breakable] Environment

K

Repair [Breakable] Environment

J

Credits

Johan Tan

Audio Programmer, General Programmer

Molina Mey

Producer, Artist

Brandon Nguyen

Designer, Producer

Efren Aguilar

Audio Designer

Nicholas Perkins

Game-play Programmer

Roger Dalke

3D Artist, Programmer

Textures used are Stylized Stone Texture, Lava Brick, MK Glass 3, Stylized Water Texture, and Stylized Metal Texture.
